hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah said: "There are three who are promised the help of Allah: The Mukatab who wants to buy his freedom, the one who gets married seeking to keep himself chaste, and the Mujahid who fights in the cause of Allah." *Mukatab: the slave who has made a contract of manumission

chapter.ara-name: باب مَعُونَةِ اللَّهِ النَّاكِحَ الَّذِي يُرِيدُ الْعَفَافَ .
chapter.eng-name: Allah Will Help the One Who Marries, Seeking To Keep Himself Chaste
